segments.text: Can you believe that Susan got married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I remember she said if she would remain single . Is the man very rich ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . That ’ s what is surprising me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You means she didn ’ t marry a rich man .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought she would marry a fortune .
segments.speaker: S2
